item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "An intellectual is a person who has discovered something more interesting than sex." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I can resist anything except temptation." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Every woman is a rebel." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "در همین جهان است که دست کم می توانی امیدوار باشی که روزی کلک خودت را بکنی، امیدی که در آن جهان نمی تواند وجود داشته باشد." -- صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by صادق هدايت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "شانس ما اگر شانس بوددسته بيل درخت مي شد " -- صادق هدايت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "کسانی هستند که از بیست سالگی شروع به جان کندن می کنند." -- صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "زندگی من مثل یک شمع آب می شود، نه اشتباه می کنم-مثل یک کنده ی هیزم تر است که گوشه ی دیگدان افتاده و به آتش هیزم های دیگر برشته و زغال شده، ولی نه سوخته و نه تر و تازه مانده، فقط از دود و دم دیگران خفه شده" -- صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "زکی! مردن هم جدی نیست، شاید از هرکار و هرچیز دیگری کمتر جدی باشد." -- صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "این هوشی که به آن می نازیم و در هر ساعت به آن تفاخر می کنیم، در هر دقیقه ما را گول می زند." -- صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Mahdyar add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda
